sentences.sentence: Ray Dolby: Net worth $2.4 billion | Drop: $1.2 billion
sentences.translation: 雷·杜比 （Ray Dolby）：净资产24亿美元，缩水12亿美元

sentences.sentence: It is a competing format to Dolby Digital which was released about a year after.
sentences.translation: 这是一个稍后一年发布具有竞争力的杜比数字格式。

sentences.sentence: When Shenton reconvened the society last year, Dolby accepted membership number 00001.
sentences.translation: 去年珊顿重建协会，接纳杜比先生为第00001号会员。
